description:
Apache Karaf is a small OSGi based runtime which provides a lightweight container onto which various components and applications can be deployed.

Some of the features supported by Karaf:
- Hot deployment
- Dynamic configuration
- Logging System
- Provisioning
- Native OS integration
- Extensible Shell console
- Remote access
- Security framework
- Managing instances
summary: OSGi-based runtime which provides a lightweight container onto which various applications can be deployed.
author: Apache Software Foundation
